schema.description: JSON Schema for describing actions carried out during liquidhandling

version.description: the version of the schema, for validation

actions.description: the actions carried out during the liquidhandling operation

liquid.description: Describe a liquid in a plate well

name.description: The display name of the liquid

total_volume.description: The total volume present of the liquid

components.description: The sub-components which make up this liquid

name.description: the display name of the sub-component

unit.description: the units in which the concentration is expressed

measurement.description: A measurement, typically of a Volume

unit.description: The units in which the measurement is expressed

wellLocation.description: the location of a well within a liquidhandling robot

deck_item_id.description: The ID of an item (prior to liquidhandling)

contentUpdate.description: updates the contents of a well

height.description: The height of the end of the tip relative to something

unit.description: The units in which the height is expressed

from.description: the source location of the transfer

to.description: the destination(s) of the transfer, multiple implies multi-dispense

volume.description: the volume of liquid transferred in this operation

wasted.description: the volume of liquid wasted in this operation

policy.description: the name of the liquid type for this transfer

asp.description: Parameters related to the way in which aspiration was performed

dsp.description: Parameters related to the way in which dispensing was performed

blowout.description: parameters related to a blowout operation

volume.description: the volume used for a blowout, if performed

height.description: the height from which to perform a blowout

flow_rate.description: the flow rate for the blowout operation

touchoff.description: whether or not a touchoff is performed

head.description: the head to load tips to or unload tips from

pipettingOptions.description: describes options about how pipetting was carried out

liquid_level_follow.description: if true, follow the liquid level during the operation

mixing.description: summarize the properties of an optional mixing operation

cycles.description: The number of mix cycles that were carried out

liquid_level_follow.description: if true, follow the liquid level during the operation

parallelTransfer.description: represents a list of transfers that are carried out simultaneously by a set of channels

channels.description: the array of channels, indexed by channel number

time_estimate.description: estimate of time taken for this instruction, in seconds

cumulative_time_estimate.description: estimate of total time taken for the run so far after this instruction has completed, in seconds

tipAction.description: describe the action of loading or unloading tips

head.description: the head to load tips to or unload tips from

channels.description: the position(s) to load tips from or drop tips to for each channel.

time_estimate.description: estimate of time taken for this instruction, in seconds

cumulative_time_estimate.description: estimate of total time taken for the run so far after this instruction has completed, in seconds

transferAction.description: describe an entire transfer action, which is a list of load, unload & parallelTransfer operations that are logically grouped

children.description: the child actions carried out during this transfer

time_estimate.description: estimate of time taken for this instruction, in seconds

cumulative_time_estimate.description: estimate of total time taken for the run so far after this instruction has completed, in seconds

promptAction.description: describes an on-screen prompt which waits for user input

message.description: the message that is shown to the user

time_estimate.description: estimate of time taken for this instruction, in seconds

cumulative_time_estimate.description: estimate of total time taken for the run so far after this instruction has completed, in seconds

waitAction.description: describes an on-screen prompt which waits for user input

duration_seconds.description: how long to wait for, in seconds

time_estimate.description: estimate of time taken for this instruction, in seconds

cumulative_time_estimate.description: estimate of total time taken for the run so far after this instruction has completed, in seconds

message.description: the (optional) message that is shown to the user while waiting
